content.question: The researchers hypothesize that juvenile salmon use chemical cues to detect predators that are nearby. Which of the following modifications to the experiment will help the researchers test their hypothesis?

choices.label: Remove the mesh screen from the channel so that the predators have access to the juvenile salmon.
Change the light schedule so that there are twice as many nighttime hours as daytime hours.
Add rocks to the channel that the juvenile salmon can use to hide from predators.
Replace the mesh screen with a solid, transparent barrier that allows light to pass through.

content.answer: Replace the mesh screen with a solid, transparent barrier that allows light to pass through.

skill.text: 3.D: Propose a new investigation based on an evaluation of the experimental design or evidence.
